video_prompt: A robed figure ascends illuminated steps into a grand structure, as another figure walks away foreground. Lush tropical foliage sways. A distant glowing tower pulsates. Wispy clouds drift across the sky, as mist/smoke trails from the main building. Shadows shift, and golden light emanates from within the structure.
image_prompt: **A grand, imposing cathedral-like structure in a graphic novel style. A robed figure ascends stairs towards an illuminated entrance, while another walks away in the foreground. Lush tropical foliage surrounds the building. A slender tower with a glowing orb pierces a teal, cloud-streaked sky. Rich golden, amber, green, and blue tones, with thick dark outlines, evoke mystery and grandeur.**
refined_video_prompt: A robed figure ascends into a luminous space, as another figure recedes foreground. Lush tropical foliage sways. A distant glowing tower pulsates. Wispy clouds drift across the sky, and mist billows. Shadows shift, and golden light emanates from within.
